name: arsd-official
description: A container of various subpackages that do lots of different things. You should use one of the subpackages instead of the main package in most cases, but you can try the complete package if you get duplicated dependency issues.

subPackages.name: simpledisplay
subPackages.description: Window creation and basic drawing

subPackages.name: minigui
subPackages.description: Small GUI widget library for Windows and Linux

subPackages.name: nanovega
subPackages.description: Vector graphics library

subPackages.name: email
subPackages.description: Email helper library, both sending MIME messages and parsing incoming mbox/maildir messages

subPackages.name: image_files
subPackages.description: Image file format support - PNG read/write, JPEG, TGA, BMP, PCX, TGA, DDS read.

subPackages.name: htmltotext
subPackages.description: HTML to plain text conversion

subPackages.name: dom
subPackages.description: HTML tag soup DOM library

subPackages.name: characterencodings
subPackages.description: Character encodings to UTF-8

subPackages.name: cgi
subPackages.description: web server library with cgi, fastcgi, scgi, and embedded http server support

subPackages.name: mysql
subPackages.description: MySQL client library. Wraps the official C library with my database.d interface.

subPackages.name: postgres
subPackages.description: Postgresql client library. Wraps the libpq C library with my database.d interface.

subPackages.name: sqlite
subPackages.description: sqlite wrapper. Wraps the official C library with my database.d interface.

subPackages.name: mssql
subPackages.description: Microsoft SQL Server client library. Wraps the official ODBC library with my database.d interface.

subPackages.name: http
subPackages.description: HTTP client library. Depends on OpenSSL right now on all platforms. On 32 bit Windows, you may need to get OMF openssl lib and dlls (ask me if you can't find it)

subPackages.name: jsvar
subPackages.description: Javascript-like object in D, capable of json read/write/manipulation.

subPackages.name: script
subPackages.description: Small Javascript-like script interpreter with easy D API

subPackages.name: terminal
subPackages.description: Cross-platform Terminal I/O with color, mouse support, real time input, etc.

subPackages.name: ttf
subPackages.description: port of stb_ttf to D

subPackages.name: color_base
subPackages.description: Base color, point, image interface definitions

subPackages.name: database_base
subPackages.description: Basic database interface definitions. Use one (or more) of the drivers like arsd-official:mysql or arsd-official:postgres instead
